But other than that it‚Äôs pretty good. Also devs I really wish you wouldn‚Äôt make the timers on story mode. It‚Äôs actually kinda pathetic to get an easy four bucks. content.label: He‚Äôs the best because I like that game

I am a long time player of DTM. I prefer playing survival mode over the other game modes. In survival mode, you played for tokens and you cashed in tokens for coins or power ups. The last time I played, there was no limit on the amount of tokens you could win. Now you can only win 3 tokens every 8 hours or so. Now there is no point to playing survival mode! The tokens you won basically replenished your power-ups or the coins you spent on weapons or health throughout survival mode. It would be better to give less prizes when you redeem the tokens than to limit the tokens received every 8 hours. Currently, the most you can win when redeeming a token is $250 in coins, 3 tokens or a power-up. Please reconsider going back to have survival mode was originally-- allow players to accrue tokens throughout the game without a token and time limit! I spent more in-game currency before the limit and I also purchased more tokens too. Now, I only want to play (not really because it's not fun) once a day, whereas before, I played for hours! Sincerely, Longtime Player and Fan of Halfbrick!!

What happened to this game? I was bored a few days ago ago I re-downloaded this game to occupy me. First thing I noticed was multiplayer, and I was really happy because I‚Äôve been waiting for that feature for quite some time. Second thing I noticed was the ads. There are SO MANY ADS. It‚Äôs terrible, every mission start, end, checkpoint, EVERYTHING INVOLVES AN AD BEING PLAYED. The third thing I noticed is while playing survival, you don‚Äôt instantly get revived by the revival potion like you used to, now it‚Äôs either watch an ad, or die. The forth thing I noticed was that while playing the story, when you unlock a new level, you have to wait 4 hours to play that level. I don‚Äôt understand, why would the devs do this? Just why? This game used to be my favorite game to play, if you can even call it that anymore. Now it‚Äôs just an ad fest. Yes, 2.99 to remove ads really isn‚Äôt a lot, but I don‚Äôt see the point in paying to play a free game.

All the stuff I purchased was gone! All of em! And yes, the things I paid real money for was GONE! That‚Äôs when I decided I would delete dan the man.
If you could reply to this and then fix that glitch then I would be really happy as my cousin would probably be upset. So PLEASE do so.

I don‚Äôt know if you guys will see this, but I am truly in love with this game. Not only do I like this game, I really like the Barry character in the game. So when I figured out you can get him for free by inviting your friends I got really excited, so I sent them an invite right away. I sent it to my five friends and I only got 4 out of the 5 prizes. The last one which is Barry I did not Receive. So I sent it to my cousins a ton of kids from school and both of my parents. Literally, I‚Äôm not joking. AND I NEVER GOT HIM. I would gladly ask you if you can give it to me for free and then I‚Äôll give you a 5 star rating. Other than that, I‚Äôm leaving it at 1 because all you did was scam me and all I did for you was give you a whole ton of new players.
